about_the_game:
Uncover even deeper mysteries in the  DLC for "Mind Echoes: The Lost Mysteries." With four additional locations, even more hidden objects to find, and additional puzzles and mini-games, this expansion takes your supernatural investigation to the next level. Delve into the enigmatic past of the Starlight Dreams Hotel and its spectral inhabitants as you unravel secrets that could change Emily Rivers’ story forever!

Collect new supernatural artifacts and earn unique achievements as you delve deeper into the hotel’s mysteries. The DLC seamlessly integrates into the main storyline, offering additional backstory and character development. Learn more about the lives and fates of the hotel’s residents and their connection to Emily’s past.

🕯️ EXPLORE THE OTHERWORLDLY OFFICE!

Step into the eerie office of the hotel’s mysterious owner. Solve intricate mini-games to uncover valuable objects and information that shed light on the hotel’s dark history.

🕯️ FIND OLIVIA’S DIARY!

Venture onto the supernatural balcony of Olivia’s room. Investigate her table of cryptic notes and discover personal insights into her tragic past and connection to the Starlight Dreams Hotel.

🕯️ CHECK OUT CATHERINE’S NOTES!

Search the haunted library study for clues about the hotel’s secrets. Scour bookshelves, examine an analogue for scrolls, and inspect an ancient aquarium. Conquer a series of puzzles and mini-games to unlock Catherine’s hidden knowledge.

🕯️ UNRAVEL THE EXPERIMENTS!

Explore the unsettling laboratory of the otherworldly hospital. Investigate strange anatomical models, an ominous operating table, and a tabletop lab. Piece together the chilling story of the doctors’ experiments by solving challenging mini-games.

Dive back into the haunting world of “Mind Echoes” with this gripping DLC—where every shadow hides a secret, every room tells a story, and the echoes of the past refuse to be silenced!
